mapper.select: SELECT czb_order.id orderId, shop_name shopName, shop_address shopAddress, commodity_title commodityTitle, is_pay isPay, commodity_price commodityPrice, usage_count usageCount, usage_count - count(czb_commodity_usage_record.order_id) surplusCount, shop_phone shopPhone, czb_order.create_at createAt, save_path savePath FROM czb_order LEFT JOIN czb_shop ON czb_order.shop_id = czb_shop.shop_id LEFT JOIN czb_commodity ON czb_order.commodity_id = czb_commodity.commodity_id LEFT JOIN czb_commodity_usage_record ON czb_order.id = czb_commodity_usage_record.order_id LEFT JOIN czb_file ON czb_file.file_id = czb_commodity.commodity_img WHERE czb_order.comsumer_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND czb_order.state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY czb_order.id ORDER BY czb_order.create_at DESC
